title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

for Rural and Community Development) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister rural community development) order 2020

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Niall O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Niall O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Rural and Community Development, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Rural and Community Development 
with effect from 29 June 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

29 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [419] 3
